page.title: 13LAW AND ORDER
page.content: {LAW AND ORDER The{Policemen}cover an area which starts from Whitrope (an old railway tunnel on the way from Hawick)to the Dumfries Border(half way to Canonbie).The{Police Station}was built in 1958. They have two-way radio,fluorescent jackets and breathaliser equipment.The two cells in the{Police Station}have 1 wooden bed apiece and toilets without a chain so prisoners can't hang themselves.The lights were built into the wall and surrounded by unbreakable glass in case of attempted suicide. There is a button in the wall for getting the{Policeman. There are two{Policemen}and one car at the station.The{police}car can travel over 90 mph.The{police}only keep people overnight.The two {policemen}live in the{police station.
